Title: Directs the NY power authority to oversee mandated energy reduction efforts in state and public authority owned and managed buildings
Summary: Directs the NY power authority to oversee mandated energy reduction efforts in state and public authority owned and managed buildings.
LawCode: Amd ยง1005, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to directing state agencies and public authorities to reduce their energy use, and to prepare reports of their actions and achievements relating to energy efficiency and provide such reports to the New York power authority
